# Flamebound Weapon (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]] (Silver Flame)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Weapon touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Five Nations (WotC), pg. 155

Casting this spell is a swift action. With it, you imbue a weapon you hold with the power of the Silver Flame. The weapon becomes sheathed in a silvery nimbus of light and deals an additional 1d6 points of sacred damage upon striking an evil creature.

**Special:** Only paladins of the Silver Flame can cast this spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* This spell is only exclusive to paladins of the Silver Flame in the Eberron campaign setting. In other campaign settings, this spell is granted by deities of good alignment whose domains must include two of the following: [[Fire (Domain)|Fire]], [[Good (Domain)|Good]], [[Law (Domain)|Law]], [[Protection (Domain)|Protection]], and/or [[Sun (Domain)|Sun]].
